dmca.title: [ABUSE] Server Publishing Dispute Cease & Desist
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 01, 2005 5:22 PM
To: MusicTVandFilm@aol.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Server Publishing Dispute Cease & Desist

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: MusicTVandFilm@aol.com <MusicTVandFilm@aol.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Date: Monday, February 28, 2005, 7:28:35 PM
Subject: [ABUSE] Server Publishing Dispute Cease & Desist

===8<==============Original message text=============== Hello

I need to speak to someone regarding the server that is hosting the site of

nickyhiltononline.com

I am the officially licensed entity that has the exclusive rights to andy
and all Official Nicky Hilton's online websites as signed and notarized in a
written document by Nicky Hilton herself.

It has come to my attention that John Galletta has registered the website
name with Network Solutions and has contracted with your firm to host the
publishing of this site.

I am filing for injunctive relief with the Los Angeles Superior Court to
seek and immediate suspension to this.

I need this website taken down immediately as it is causing me economic and
business interference.

Where do I fax these legal documents proving that I am the sole entity
authorized to handle all Nicky Hilton official websites?   Please call me
upon
receipt of this letter.

David Mahon






David Mahon
Performing Artist's Management Group
9663 Santa Monica Blvd, #357
Beverly Hills, CA 90210
310.849.2109 Direct
888.558.6757 Fax

This message contains information which may be confidential and privileged.
Unless you are the intended recipient (or authorized to receive this message
for the intended recipient), you may not use, copy, disseminate or disclose
to anyone the message or any information contained in the message.  If you
have received the message in error, please advise the sender by reply
e-mail, and delete the message. 

===8<===========End of original message text=========== -----BEGIN PGP
SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCJPj7vK/XpJs6oyURAi3JAJ48aj9eM8cVX4dpuDirqnbMAdJ7kwCfVVG3
KI75/wI4kLE20uZDS4yOR0U=
=tKbp
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
